author: barvic
body:
#### PR description:
Backport to 12_3_X of CSC DQM Run3 related updates PR #37732

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Would like to deploy this DQM update to P5 production for online DQM, while 12_3_X is used there to monitor ongoing CSC Run3 system validation.
title: Backport to 12_3_X CSC DQM Run3 related updates PR#37732
